title: Postcards from Goa
description: Goa, India 1945 India sought to reclaim her land from 400 years of Portuguese rule. Amidst the turmoil, and hatred, a friendship is born between two people from opposing sides. As the forbidden friendship deepens, could anything destroy the peace and love that they find in each other? Nova Scotia, Canada 1998 Five decades later, and thousands of miles away, the story begins to unfold. Will the curiosity to solve the mystery, be enough for one woman to travel to India to find the truth? Or is there more to the reason behind why she needs to know?
author: Simran Silva
